Deprecated API

  • Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ContextListener
    Embeddings that wish to customize newly created Context instances should implement ContextFactory.Listener.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.CharacterSheet
    This class serves only to allow deserialization of old components.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.ComponentFace
    This class serves only to allow deserialization of old components.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.tools.shell.ShellLine
  • Fields
    Field
    Description
    ca.cgjennings.platform.PlatformSupport.PLATFORM_IS_OSX
    Alias for PlatformSupport.PLATFORM_IS_MAC.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.FEATURE_PARENT_PROTO_PROPRTIES
    In previous releases, this name was given to FEATURE_PARENT_PROTO_PROPERTIES.
  • Methods
    Method
    Description
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.AbstractGameComponentEditor.forceRerender()
    Replaced by AbstractGameComponentEditor.redrawPreview().
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.AbstractGameComponent.idealScaleForImage​(double, double, double, double)
    Use ImageUtilities.idealCoveringScaleForImage(double, double, double, double).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.AbstractGameComponent.imagePathToImage​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.get(java.lang.String) to load user-supplied images.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.DefaultPortrait.setFacesToUpdate​(int)
    It is preferable, and easier, to use DefaultPortrait.setFacesToUpdate(int[]).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.dialog.prefs.FillInPreferenceCategory.addHelp​(String, String, boolean)
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.diy.DIY.getCardVersion()
    Replaced by DIY.getVersion().
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.diy.DIY.setCardVersion​(int)
    Replaced by DIY.setVersion(int).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.diy.DIY.upgradeOldPropertyNames()
    This should only be called in an onRead function when upgrading very old DIY components.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.NewEditorDialog.getIconForComponent​(GameComponent)
    No suitable replacement yet, but don't want people to start using it.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.BundleInstaller.isFXRuntimeAvailable()
    This method returns false.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.catalog.PluginBundlePublisher.packBundle​(File, File)
    The Pack200 tools used by this method have been removed from Java. Calling this method will copy the file without changes.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.catalog.PluginBundlePublisher.unpackBundle​(File, File)
    The Pack200 tools used by this method have been removed from Java. Calling this method on a packed file will throw an exception.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.ScriptMonkey.breakScript()
    This method is called indirectly from within scripts to cause the script to exit. It must be public to be visible to scripts; it is not intended for other purposes and should not be called by user code.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.project.PublishBundle.publish​(File, int)
    Takes an integer compression method for backwards compatibility. Use PublishBundle.publish(java.io.File, ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.catalog.PluginBundlePublisher.CompressionMethod) instead.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.project.Rename.rename​(Member, String)
    Replaced by Member.renameFile(java.lang.String).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.Sheet.centerTitle​(Graphics2D, String, Rectangle, Font, float, boolean)
    Included for backwards compatibility with old plug-ins; use Sheet.drawTitle(java.awt.Graphics2D, java.lang.String, java.awt.Rectangle, java.awt.Font, float, int) instead.
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.filters.GlowFilter.getDistance()
    Replaced by GlowFilter.getBlurRadius().
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.filters.GlowFilter.setDistance​(int)
    Replaced by GlowFilter.setBlurRadius(int).
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.filters.StrokeFilter.getARGB()
    Replaced by StrokeFilter.getColorRGB() for consistency.
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.filters.StrokeFilter.setARGB​(int)
    Replaced by StrokeFilter.setColorRGB(int) for consistency.
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.fetchImage​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.get(java.lang.String) to load user images so that you can work with both bitmap and vector images transparently.
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.getMissingImage()
    Use StrangeImage to load user images and ResourceKit.getMissingImage() or StrangeImage.getMissingImage() to get the missing image as a BufferedImage or StrangeImage, respectively.
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.imageExists​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.exists(java.lang.String).
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.isURLString​(String)
    Use StrangeImage to load user images and !StrangeImage.isFileIdentifier( identifier ) as a replacement for this call.
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.translatePathToImageURL​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.identifierToURL(java.lang.String).
    ca.cgjennings.layout.MarkupRenderer.addLibrary​(String)
     
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ClassCache.isInvokerOptimizationEnabled()
    The method always returns false.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ClassCache.setInvokerOptimizationEnabled​(boolean)
    The method does nothing. Invoker optimization is no longer used by Rhino. On modern JDK like 1.4 or 1.5 the disadvantages of the optimization like increased memory usage or longer initialization time overweight small speed increase that can be gained using generated proxy class to replace reflection.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.addContextListener​(ContextListener)
     
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.call​(ContextAction<T>)
    use ContextFactory.call(ContextAction) instead as this method relies on usage of a static singleton "global" ContextFactory.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.compileReader​(Scriptable, Reader, String, int, Object)
     
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.enter​(Context)
    use ContextFactory.enterContext(Context) instead as this method relies on usage of a static singleton "global" ContextFactory.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.removeContextListener​(ContextListener)
     
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.setCachingEnabled​(boolean)
     
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.toObject​(Object, Scriptable, Class<?>)
     
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context.toType​(Object, Class<?>)
     
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ContextFactory.enter()
    use ContextFactory.enterContext() instead
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ContextFactory.exit()
    Use Context.exit() instead.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ContextListener.contextEntered​(Context)
    Rhino runtime never calls the method.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ContextListener.contextExited​(Context)
    Rhino runtime never calls the method.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.EcmaError.getColumnNumber()
    Use RhinoException.columnNumber() from the super class.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.EcmaError.getErrorObject()
    Always returns null.

    Use RhinoException.lineNumber() from the super class.

    Use RhinoException.lineSource() from the super class.

    Use RhinoException.sourceName() from the super class.

    Use RhinoException.columnNumber() from the super class.

    Use RhinoException.lineNumber() from the super class.

    Use RhinoException.lineSource() from the super class.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.EvaluatorException.getSourceName()
    Use RhinoException.sourceName() from the super class.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.FunctionObject.convertArg​(Context, Scriptable, Object, Class<?>)
    Use FunctionObject.getTypeTag(Class) and FunctionObject.convertArg(Context, Scriptable, Object, int) for type conversion.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ImporterTopLevel.importPackage​(Context, Scriptable, Object[], Function)
    Kept only for compatibility.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.JavaScriptException.getLineNumber()
    Use RhinoException.lineNumber() from the super class.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.JavaScriptException.getSourceName()
    Use RhinoException.sourceName() from the super class.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeArray.jsGet_length()
    Use NativeArray.getLength() instead.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeFunction.jsGet_name()
    Use BaseFunction.getFunctionName() instead. For backwards compatibility keep an old method name used by Batik and possibly others.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeGlobal.constructError​(Context, String, String, Scriptable)
    Use ScriptRuntime.constructError(String,String) instead.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeGlobal.constructError​(Context, String, String, Scriptable, String, int, int, String)
    Use ScriptRuntime.constructError(String,String,String,int,String,int) instead.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeJavaObject.coerceType​(Class<?>, Object)
    as of 1.5 Release 4
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeJavaObject.wrap​(Scriptable, Object, Class<?>)
    Use Context.getWrapFactory() together with calling WrapFactory.wrap(Context, Scriptable, Object, Class)
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.optimizer.OptRuntime.elemIncrDecr​(Object, double, Context, int)
    Use OptRuntime.elemIncrDecr(Object, double, Context, Scriptable, int) instead
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Parser.parse​(Reader, String, int)
    use parse(String, String, int) instead
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Ref.set​(Context, Object)
    Use Ref.set(Context, Scriptable, Object) instead
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.RhinoException.getScriptStackTrace​(FilenameFilter)
    the filter argument is ignored as we are able to recognize script stack elements by our own. Use #getScriptStackTrace() instead.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject.getAttributes​(int, Scriptable)
    Use ScriptableObject.getAttributes(int index). The engine always ignored the start argument.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject.getAttributes​(String, Scriptable)
    Use ScriptableObject.getAttributes(String name). The engine always ignored the start argument.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject.setAttributes​(int, Scriptable, int)
    Use ScriptableObject.setAttributes(int index, int attributes). The engine always ignored the start argument.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject.setAttributes​(String, Scriptable, int)
    Use ScriptableObject.setAttributes(String name, int attributes). The engine always ignored the start argument.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ScriptRuntime.add​(CharSequence, Object)
    Use ScriptRuntime.add(Object, Object, Context) instead
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ScriptRuntime.add​(Object, CharSequence)
    Use ScriptRuntime.add(Object, Object, Context) instead
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.ScriptRuntime.call​(Context, Object, Object, Object[], Scriptable)
    The method is only present for compatibility.

    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.SecurityController.execWithDomain​(Context, Scriptable, Script, Object)
    The application should not override this method and instead override SecurityController.callWithDomain(Object securityDomain, Context cx, Callable callable, Scriptable scope, Scriptable thisObj, Object[] args).
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.tools.shell.ShellLine.getStream​(Scriptable)
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.WrappedException.unwrap()
    Use WrappedException.getWrappedException() instead.
    ca.cgjennings.ui.JHelpButton.setWikiPage​(String)
    ca.cgjennings.ui.wizard.WizardPanel.setLayout​(LayoutManager)
    This class uses its own internal layout manager and does not support setting a different manager.
    gamedata.Expansion.getSymbol​(boolean)
    This method is provided to ease migration from SE 2.x. It is equivalent to calling getSymbol( inverse ? 1 : 0 ).
    gamedata.Expansion.register​(Game, String, String, String, String, String)
    This method is provided to ease migration from SE 2.x. It should not be called by plug-in authors.
    gamedata.Expansion.setGameForExpansion​(String, String)
    This method is used only to allow backwards compatibility with script code from SE 2.x. It should not be called by plug-in authors.
    resources.ResourceKit.getMicroversionString()
    The complex microversion string has been replaced by a simple build number that is easier to compare when enabling version-dependent features. To obtain the build number, call StrangeEons.getBuildNumber().
  • Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.Context()
    this constructor is deprecated because it creates a dependency on a static singleton context factory. Use ContextFactory.enter() or ContextFactory.call(ContextAction) instead. If you subclass this class, consider using Context(ContextFactory) constructor instead in the subclasses' constructors.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.EcmaError​(Scriptable, String, int, int, String)
    EcmaError error instances should not be constructed explicitly since they are generated by the engine.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.JavaScriptException​(Object)
    Use WrappedException(Throwable) to report exceptions in Java code.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeJavaPackage​(String)
    NativeJavaPackage is an internal class, do not use it directly.
    ca.cgjennings.script.mozilla.javascript.NativeJavaPackage​(String, ClassLoader)
    NativeJavaPackage is an internal class, do not use it directly.
